Title: Full Moon wo Sagashite: Kawaii Kawaii Daibouken
Description:
['Mitsuki wakes up late, and must rush to a photo shoot. However, in her hury she forgets to bring Takuto and Meroko along. Now they must catch up to her, before the photo shoot begins, despite everything that gets in their way.', '
', '
', '

(Source: ANN)']
